mapper.update: UPDATE BPM_TABLE_TEMPLATE SET TABLE_ID=#{tableId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , CATEGORY_ID=#{categoryId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , HTML_LIST=#{htmlList,jdbcType=CLOB} , HTML_DETAIL=#{htmlDetail,jdbcType=CLOB} , TEMPLATE_NAME=#{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR_TYPE=#{authorType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FORMKEY=#{formKey,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, memo=#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.ID,a.TABLE_ID,a.CATEGORY_ID,a.TEMPLATE_NAME,a.AUTHOR_TYPE,a.FORMKEY,a.MEMO,b.tablename,c.typename categoryName from bpm_table_template a inner join bpm_form_table b on a.table_id=b.tableid left outer join sys_gl_type c on a.category_id=c.typeid where a.formKey=#{formKey} order by ID desc
